org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users INNER JOIN friends ON users.id = friends.friend_user_id INNER JOIN users AS befriendees_friends ON befriendees_friends.id = friends.friend_user_id WHERE friends.user_id = "$1" AND users.status IN ("$2", "$3")

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users INNER JOIN friends ON users.id = friends.friend_user_id WHERE friends.user_id = "$1" AND users.status IN ("$2", "$3")
